snippet.title: Stop Santa - Tower Defense (Trailer)
snippet.description:
We're taking the war on Christmas all the way to the North Pole. Santa has gone crazy and created an army of dilapidated elves, zombie Santas and sadistic penguins. It's now up to the remaining elves to Stop Santa!

This is a classic tower defense game which includes 3 unique holiday themed tower types each with 3 upgrades! Do you have what it takes to finally STOP SANTA once and for all?
